name: google-account-auto-chooser
description: Firefox addon that automatically selects Google accounts based on URL patterns

scripts.build: npm run clean && npm run copy && npm run icons
scripts.copy: mkdir -p dist && cp -r src/* dist/ && sed 's|src/||g' manifest.json > dist/manifest.json
scripts.icons: mkdir -p dist/icons && cp icons/* dist/icons/ 2>/dev/null || echo 'Icons not found, creating placeholder'
scripts.dev: npm run build && echo 'Addon built in dist/ folder. Load from Firefox about:debugging'
scripts.package: npm run build && cd dist && zip -r ../google-account-auto-chooser.zip .
